name: Arch Linux Dark Bugs 2013 (pdq)
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain(bugs.archlinux.org){input, textarea, select {color: #CFCFCF;background-color: #0D0D0D;border-color: #353535;-moz-appearance: none !important;} .calendar {border-top-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #D1E7FF !important;} .calendar table {border-top-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #D1E7FF !important;} .calendar thead .title {border-top-color: .calendar tbody .day.othermonth {color: #454545 !important;} .calendar tbody .day.othermonth.oweekend {color: #3E0807 !important;} .calendar tbody td.hilite {border-top-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-left-color: #D1E7FF !important;} .calendar tbody td.weekend {color: #BA1715 !important;} .calendar tbody td.today {color: #1715BA !important;} .calendar tfoot .hilite {border-top-color: #D1E7FF !important;border-right-color: #CFCFCF !important;border-bottom-color: #CFCFCF
